data.name: Paper Wizards
data.detailed_description:
This game is difficult and challenging fast-paced action with ability to tailor your approach and construct your skills to match your own style, rely on your agility, destructive power or quick decision making skills to overcome all the challenges the game can throw at you.

Features Include

  • Ability crafting system, allowing for hundreds of combinations
  • Challenging gameplay and difficult encounters
  • Endless Procedural Levels
  • 11 unique enemies with their own AI behavior and mechanics
data.about_the_game:
This game is difficult and challenging fast-paced action with ability to tailor your approach and construct your skills to match your own style, rely on your agility, destructive power or quick decision making skills to overcome all the challenges the game can throw at you.

Features Include

  • Ability crafting system, allowing for hundreds of combinations
  • Challenging gameplay and difficult encounters
  • Endless Procedural Levels
  • 11 unique enemies with their own AI behavior and mechanics
data.short_description: an exciting fast-paced first person action game with bullet-hell mechanics that make you feel like a powerful wizard. You get to plan your approach and then test your skills in combat and platforming situations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
